properties.Observatio: It is difficult to reach the water source. This well-developed water scheme is currently operating well.
properties.Descriptio:
Vegetative cover improving around the watershed with Areca nut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings and planting at 3.5m x 3.5 m grid interval

properties.Observatio: Reserve land is being illegally acquired because the boundaries are not marked. This area may be about 80 perch of which about 50% are large trees.
